data.eml:eml: Phortica eparmata species complex (Diptera, Drosophilidae) from the Oriental Region, with DNA barcoding information of Chinese species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhu, Lin, Cao, Huiluo, Chen, Hongwei (2018): Phortica eparmata species complex (Diptera, Drosophilidae) from the Oriental Region, with DNA barcoding information of Chinese species. European Journal of Taxonomy 403: 1-18, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.403
